level.heading: Use of nonconforming material or equipment.
level.text: ยง 27-902 Use of nonconforming material or equipment. (a) No person shall use or install any new or used plumbing material or equipment, unless it complies with the requirements set forth in this subchapter and reference standard RS-16. (b) No person shall use any portable equipment that utilizes mercury to test the pressure of gas piping, drainage or vent systems.
